title: Textile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: relief printed on plain weave; quilted with running stitch
dimensions:
H x W: 66.5 x 53.5 cm (26 3/16 x 21 1/16 in.)
Repeat H x W (half drop): 21 x 12.7 cm (8 1/4 in. x 5 in.)
description: Fragment of a quilted fabric with a design of small-scale floral sprigs in bright colors on a dense green leafy pattern on a black ground. Quilting at bottom is a border of narrow ribs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 18th–early 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: relief printed on plain weave; quilted with running stitch. 1973-25-16.
